entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:13 p.m. PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7Â°C

Observed at: Sparwood Airport 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
Temperature: 5.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm except 20 mm near Fernie. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
